viewTableRecordTemplate.table: SELECT role_name,admin_name,admin_pwd,address,realname,mobile,email,about,branch_name,cShortName,business_name from sysAdmin where id='$RECORDID'
SELECT id,branch_name from sysBranch where cid='$COMMUNITYID' order by branch_sort
SELECT id,business_name from business where del=0 and cid='$COMMUNITYID' order by orderId
SELECT id as branchId,branch_name from sysBranch where cid='$COMMUNITYID' order by branch_sort

with cte1 as(select * from admin_purview_$COMMUNITYTYPE where iparent = 0 union all select t.* from admin_purview_$COMMUNITYTYPE as t , cte1 as c where t.iparent = c.purview_ad_id )select purview_ad_id,pur_name,url,identify,iparent,tableName,remark from cte1 where (community_id=$COMMUNITYID or community_id=0) order by iparent,sequence
select '$USERID' as USERID,'$REALNAME' as REALNAME,convert(nvarchar(10),getDate(),120) as curDate

select purview_ad_id,pur_name,url,identify,community_id from dbo.admin_purview_$COMMUNITYTYPE where iparent=0 and identify in(select identify from adrole_purview_$COMMUNITYTYPE where role_ad_id='$ROLEID') and pur_name!='无节点模块' order by sequence
exec proc_createLeftStr $COMMUNITYTYPE,$ROLEID

select table_name,' '+(case when table_name like 'DThtrecord_main_%' then description+wf_titleShort else description end)+'('+cast(dealCount as varchar(10))+'条)' wf_pStr from (select table_name,description,wf_title,(case when wf_title like '%复查' then '--待复查' when wf_title like '已发送%' then '--待整改' else '--'+wf_title end) wf_titleShort,deal_url,COUNT(deal_url) dealCount from wf_pendingrequest_$COMMUNITYID where (user_type='user' and next_user='$USERID' and next_user_community='$SHORTNAME') or (user_type='role' and next_user='$ROLEID' and next_user_community='$SHORTNAME') or (user_type='branch' and next_user='$WORKGROUPID' and next_user_community='$SHORTNAME') group by table_name,description,wf_title,deal_url) a
select id,name,url,imageName from DTIndex_quickLink where created_by='$USERID' and cType='$COMMUNITYTYPE' order by seqNo
select count(id) as smsNum from DTTools_sms where charindex(';$USERID;',';'+receiverIds)>0 and charindex(';$USERID;',';'+noReaderIds)>0
exec PROC_DTTools_remind_cal '$COMMUNITYID','$USERID'

select AzdbA, AzdbB, AfdbA, MzdbA, MzdbB, MfdbA, EzdbA, EzdbB, EfdbA, (case yearAndMonth when CONVERT(nvarchar(10),GETDATE(),120) then yearAndMonth+'<font color="red">(今天)</font>' else yearAndMonth end) as yearAndMonth from dbo.DTDuty_dbb_ks where communityId='$COMMUNITYID' and DATEDIFF(DD,GETDATE(),yearAndMonth)>=-1 and DATEDIFF(DD,GETDATE(),yearAndMonth)<=1 order by yearAndMonth

select (case tDate when CONVERT(nvarchar(10),GETDATE(),120) then tDate+'<font color="red">(今天)</font>' else tDate end) as tDate, zzb, kldfzb, ksfzb from dbo.DTDuty_zbb_sub where main_id in(select id from DTDuty_zbb_main where communityId='$COMMUNITYID') and DATEDIFF(DD,GETDATE(),tDate)>=-1 and DATEDIFF(DD,GETDATE(),tDate)<=1 order by tDate
exec proc_DTRecord_view '$COMMUNITYID'

select id,description,wf_title,wf_status,next_user_community,CONVERT(varchar(10),created_realName, 20) as created_realName,CONVERT(varchar(16),create_time, 20) as create_time,deal_url from wf_pendingrequest_$COMMUNITYID where (user_type='user' and next_user='$USERID' and next_user_community='$SHORTNAME') or (user_type='role' and next_user='$ROLEID' and next_user_community='$SHORTNAME') or (user_type='branch' and next_user='$WORKGROUPID' and next_user_community='$SHORTNAME') order by create_time desc
select '$KEYWORD1' as tableName,'$KEYWORD2' as fieldName,'$RECORDID' as recordId,'$KEYWORD3' as seqNo,'$KEYWORD4' as realFileName
exec PROC_DTParam_branchType '$COMMUNITYID','$COMMUNITYTYPE','$COMMUNITYTRADETYPE','0'
select '$KEYWORD1' as iparentDes,'$KEYWORD2' as iparent
select pur_name,url,tableName realTableName,sequence,identify,iparent,image,remark,hotKey,community_id from admin_purview_$COMMUNITYTYPE where identify='$KEYWORD1'

select id,typeName,title,content,isReady,remindType,remindDays,convert(nvarchar(16),remindDate,120) as remindDate,remindHour,convert(nvarchar(10),date_created,120) as date_created from DTTools_remind where created_by='$USERID' order by id desc
exec PROC_DTTools_remind_calList '$COMMUNITYID','$USERID','$KEYWORD1'
select typeName,typeName from DTTools_remind_typeName where isSys=1 and created_by='$USERID' order by orderNo
select '$COMMUNITYTYPE' as iniCType
select id,name,url,imageName,seqNo,convert(nvarchar(10),date_created,120) as date_created from DTIndex_quickLink where created_by ='$USERID' and cType='$COMMUNITYTYPE' order by seqNo

select id,title,realFileName,dispatching_unit,range,dispatching_type,notice_content,workGroupName,date_created from DT_NOTICE where ('$KEYWORD1'='com' and communityId='$KEYWORD2' and range=0) or ('$KEYWORD1'='more' and communityId='$COMMUNITYID')
select 'DT_NOTICE' as tableName
select id,title,realFileName,dispatching_unit,range,dispatching_type,notice_content,workGroupName,convert(nvarchar(16),date_created,120) as date_created,End_time from DT_NOTICE where id='$RECORDID'
select 'DT_NOTICE' as tableName
select id,orderId,VALUE,NAME,FIELD,TABLE_NAME,updatable,communityId from FIELD_OPTION where communityId='$COMMUNITYID'

select id,parentId as pid,jobcut_name as name,ishide as ishide,isjobcut as isjobcut,(select COUNT(1) from DTParam_workPlace d where m.id = d.parentId ) as haschild from DTParam_workPlace m where COMMUNITYID = $COMMUNITYID ORDER BY ORDERS

select distinct b.flag,wp.jobcut_name ,b.job_plan,fo.name,b.isvalid as valid from DTPlan_ktht_sub b,DTParam_workPlace wp,FIELD_OPTION fo where b.jobcut_id = wp.id and fo.description = '参数设置' and fo.description_sub = '生产计划-重点工程' and b.Iskeyproject = fo.VALUE and main_id='$RECORDID'

select id,yearandmonth,work_teamid,dbo.f_DTPlan_ktht(work_teamid,'$COMMUNITYID') as work_team,target_plan,convert(nvarchar(10),date_created,120) as date_created from DTPlan_ktht_main where id='$RECORDID' and COMMUNITYID = $COMMUNITYID

select m.flag,m.procedure_in_month,m.avg_procedure_in_day,m.target_procedure_in_month,m.valid_leap_in_month,b.branch_name from DTPlan_produce_sub m,branch b,DTParam_branchType tp where tp.id = b.bType and tp.typeName = '区队' and main_id='$RECORDID' and m.UNIT_id = b.id

select id,mtcl,pjrc,jjzjc,pjrj,ktjc,ktrjc,dbcfhjcjh,dbcfhrjc,wscfzkjc,wscfl,dbzkjc,zjl,yearandmonth,shijitianshu,tianbaoren,hf,sf,kml from DTPlan_produce_main where id='$RECORDID' and COMMUNITYID = $COMMUNITYID
select distinct flag,tDate,zzb,kldfzb,ksfzb from DTDuty_zbb_sub where main_id='$RECORDID'
select id,yearAndMonth,Company,fDate,remark,ReBranch from DTDuty_zbb_main where id='$RECORDID'
select id,Meetingid,Leader,dbo.f_field_option_Leader(Leader) as Leader_str,ArrangeWork,ResponsibilityId,ResponsibilityName,wf_status from DTBank_meeting_task where id='$RECORDID'

select w.id,w.realName,CONVERT(varchar(16),w.create_time,120) as create_time,w.content,w.processStatus,w.created_by from wf_DTBank_meeting_task w,DTBank_meeting_task t where w.record_id=t.id and t.id='$RECORDID' order by w.id
select id,Meetingid,Leader,dbo.f_field_option_Leader(Leader) as Leader_str,ArrangeWork,ResponsibilityId,ResponsibilityName,wf_status from DTBank_meeting_task where id='$RECORDID'

select w.id,w.realName,CONVERT(varchar(16),w.create_time,120) as create_time,w.content,w.processStatus,w.created_by from wf_DTBank_meeting_task w,DTBank_meeting_task t where w.record_id=t.id and t.id='$RECORDID' order by w.id

select id,workPlace,Shift,BirthDate,Exceptions,dbo.getShortFieldIfLong(Exceptions,40) as Exceptionsstring,(select realname from admin where id=451 and communityId=444) AS created_by from DTRecord_cfd where communityId='$COMMUNITYID' and BirthDate=(case '$KEYWORD1' when '当前日' then convert(nvarchar(10),getdate(),120) else '$KEYWORD1' end) AND Exceptions IS NOT NULL and Exceptions!=''
select (case '$KEYWORD1' when '当前日' then convert(nvarchar(10),getdate(),120) else '$KEYWORD1' end) as dattime
select jobcut_name as jobcut_namea from DTParam_workPlace where id='$KEYWORD2' and communityId = '$COMMUNITYID'
select id as valueid,jobcut_name from DTParam_workPlace where communityId = '$COMMUNITYID' and isJobCut = 0
select id,Specifications,NetSection,length from DTParam_workPlaceInfo where tree_id='$KEYWORD2' and communityId = '$COMMUNITYID'
exec porc_DTTaizhang_emphasis '$KEYWORD1' ,'$KEYWORD2', '$COMMUNITYID'
select (case '$KEYWORD1' when '当前月' then replace(convert(nvarchar(7),GETDATE(),120),'-','年')+'月' else '$KEYWORD1' end) as time,'$KEYWORD2' as jobcut

viewTableRecordTemplate.downFileTitle: 月度生产计划完成情况表
viewTableRecordTemplate.table: exec DTTaizhang_planFact '$KEYWORD1' , '$COMMUNITYID'
select (case '$KEYWORD1' when '当前月' then replace(convert(nvarchar(7),GETDATE(),120),'-','年')+'月' else '$KEYWORD1' end) as dattime
select name,cid from DTBank_dispatcher where id='$RECORDID'
select id,Startdate,Enddate,Workunit,Postoffice,Witnes from DTBank_dispatcher_resume where dispid='$RECORDID'
select id,Bigtitle,Smalltitle from DTWorry_bank_main where id='$RECORDID'
select id,id as sub_id,Dispatch,Step,StepContent from DTWorry_bank_sub where main_id='$RECORDID'
select id,Bigtitle,Smalltitle,Currentstep from DTWorry_bank_record
select id,id as sub_id,Dispatch,Step,StepContent,Replycontent from DTWorry_bank_record_step where record_id='$RECORDID'
select id,Bigtitle,Smalltitle,Currentstep from DTWorry_bank_record_main
select id,main_id,Step,StepContent,Dispatch,Sending from DTWorry_bank_record_sub where main_id='$RECORDID'
select id,Bigtitle,Smalltitle,Currentstep from DTWorry_bank_record
select id,id as sub_id,Dispatch,Step,StepContent,Replycontent,Operation from DTWorry_bank_record_sub_step where record_id='$RECORDID' and Typename='不显示' and Step='$KEYWORD1'
